initBlock.name: Custom Extension New Subject Area Table Labels

selectStatements.query:
SELECT replace(A.LOGICAL_TABLE,' ','_'),MAX(MSG_TEXT) FROM CONTENT_RPD_PRESENTATION_COLUMN_DETAILS A,MLS_RPD_MSG_VL B,CONTENT_RPD_PRESENTATION_TABLE_DETAILS C,CONTENT_RPD_LOGICAL_COL_MAP_DETAILS D, CONTENT_RPD_PHYSICAL_TABLE_DETAILS E,DW_DMD_EXT_TABLE_JOIN_INFO F
WHERE A.PRESENTATION_TABLE=C.PRESENTATION_TABLE AND REPLACE(REPLACE(C.CUSTOM_NAME,'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.',''),')','')=B.MSG_VAR_NAME 
AND A.LOGICAL_TABLE=D.LOGICAL_TABLE AND A.LOGICAL_COLUMN=D.LOGICAL_COLUMN
AND D.PHYSICAL_TABLE=E.PHYSICAL_TABLE
AND UPPER(E.PARENT_TABLE)=UPPER(F.LEFT_TABLE)
AND B.LANGUAGE_CODE='VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.USER_LANG_CODE)' 
GROUP BY replace(A.LOGICAL_TABLE,' ','_')
UNION
SELECT replace(A.LOGICAL_TABLE,' ','_'),MAX(MSG_TEXT) FROM CONTENT_RPD_PRESENTATION_COLUMN_DETAILS A,MLS_RPD_MSG_VL B,CONTENT_RPD_PRESENTATION_TABLE_DETAILS C,CONTENT_RPD_LOGICAL_COL_MAP_DETAILS D, CONTENT_RPD_PHYSICAL_TABLE_DETAILS E,DW_DMD_EXT_TABLE_JOIN_INFO F
WHERE A.PRESENTATION_TABLE=C.PRESENTATION_TABLE AND REPLACE(REPLACE(C.CUSTOM_NAME,'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.',''),')','')=B.MSG_VAR_NAME 
AND A.LOGICAL_TABLE=D.LOGICAL_TABLE AND A.LOGICAL_COLUMN=D.LOGICAL_COLUMN
AND D.PHYSICAL_TABLE=E.PHYSICAL_TABLE
AND UPPER(E.PARENT_TABLE)=UPPER(F.RIGHT_TABLE)
AND B.LANGUAGE_CODE='VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.USER_LANG_CODE)' 
GROUP BY replace(A.LOGICAL_TABLE,' ','_')
